section.name: Overview
section.p: The DNS services implement a simple authoritative only DNS server for hosting DNS records for a Direct messaging domain. It is intentionally tuned to handle only certain type of DNS records including CERT type records as defined by the security and trust specification.
The server can be run as a stand alone application or may be deployed as an operating system service.
For details on deploying and configuring the DNS server, see the DNS server users guide.
